module.name: pygame2.font
module.short: A module used to find system fonts
module.desc: A module used to find system fonts

func.name: find_font
func.call: find_font (name, bold=False, italic=False) -> str, bool, bool
func.desc:
Find the filename for the named system font.
This performs a font search and it returns the path to the TTF file. The font name can be a comma separated list of font names to try. If no match is found, None is returned as fontname.

func.name: get_fonts
func.desc:
Get a list of system font names.
Returns the list of all found system fonts. Note that the names of the fonts will be all lowercase with spaces removed. This is how pygame2 internally stores the font names for matching.
